title: Atrium may be allowed in any type of building
clause_text: Atrium may be allowed in any type of building. Such atrium may be allowed to be enclosed on top by transparent or opaque sheet.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Atrium may be allowed in any type of building. Such atrium may be allowed to be enclosed on top by transparent or opaque sheet.
